title: Emma’s Lullabies
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Emma-chan, Emma-chan, Emma-chan~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>W-, what is it, Kanata-chan, why are you in such a hurry<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Look, look! So many people have been listening to the goodnight songs compilation that we uploaded the other day~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh…. Eeeh!? This many!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It seems like Kanata’s prediction was right after all. Your lullabies have a tremendous effect, Emma-chan~. Here, read the comments<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>….Fufu. Everyone is saying that they couldn’t listen to the end. Normally you would want people to listen to the end, but it also makes me happy if they couldn’t get through the middle of this video<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s impossible to listen to the end~ You’ll go zzz…. in mere seconds<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hey, Kanata-chan, I want more of my lullabies to reach everyone<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Alright~, Kanata will do my best to help you again♪ But before that…. Kanata is feeling a little bit sleepy, so give me a lap pillow and sing me a song~.... Fwaah….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>There there, come here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
